item.title: Python 操作 Offices文档
item.description: 目录 start Offices文档 Word Excel xlrd pandas 目录 end|2020-04-27 23:42| Offices文档 Word Excel 参考: Python-Excel 模块哪家强？ xlrd Github addr 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 import xlrd data = xlrd.open_workbook('monster.xlsx') table = data.sheets()[0] nrows = table.nrows for i in range(nrows): for cell
